name: Safari Kids Zoo Games
description:
An antelope calf runs through the savannah to her mom, crossing many obstacles. Hello children! Discover African safari in the Kids Zoo Games series. An action game requiring fast reflexes with an antelope who must overcome all obstacles. Watch out for dangerous animals. The wild Africa is full of danger.

• Fun for the whole family – children and adults.
• Overcome obstacles with fast reflexes and watch for hidden traps and wild animals.
• African music, action-packed entertainment and an attractive environment.
• Regulated ads.
• No payments, the game is free!
